Posts.Content: Superwoman84 wrote: Hello I'm a 31 year old female with a lump and swollen lymph nodes and here's my story. My mom had breast cancer and then brain cancer and my aunt had breast cancer so it pretty much runs in my family I guess. Last year I found a lump in my breast and I got a mammogram and sonogram done and was told that the results show nothing and I was fine. This year I went back and although I got the same results from the mammo and sono my doctor is panicked (me even more so ) because the lump appears to have gotten bigger and he says my lymph node under my arm seems swollen.He says even though the test show nothing , he can feel it and it's big. I also noticed a small drop of clear discharge that came from my nipple but it was just a drop and nomore. Im going to get a biopsy done tomorrow but I haven't been able to sleep or even think because I'm so scared. The doctor said if it is cancer he's worried because the lump is big already (8 by 5 cm). I just want to know if there's can be another explanation. Let me also state that two weeks before going to the doctor I had a miscarriage at 8 wks. I just want some peace of mind , please can someone give me there thoughts Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried about a lump and swollen lymph nodes Superwoman84 Superwoman84
